features.title: White-label concept
features.description: Now we have some features that allow the addition of new themes and some new styles to different themes variation

features.title: Internationalization concept
features.description: We create some features that allow the internationalization of the entire system. With this we will be able to go to different countries

refactors: Several improvements on theme loading to improve the application bundle size

features.title: Light Theme
features.description: New we have a light theme, where the white is the base color

features.title: User status on contacts
features.description: Now you can see a user status in the contacts list

features.title: To do list drag and drop
features.description: Now you can reorder your to do list dragging and dropping items

refactors: Complete color refactor on lateral menu bars
Project layout refactor, where the margins was removed to a better space and integration with the menu bars and a better use of space by the user
Booking and Appointment slots layout adjustments and top border color correction
Dashboard grid system refactor and improvement
Refactor on chat button and voice channel controls to a better integration with fullscreen modals
Refactor and update the styles framework to a better performance

features.description: Now you can create additional columns in your project according to your needs
